participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring, determined, and a bit shy. Enjoys spending time outdoors and has a strong sense of responsibility.
participant_1.background: I play with my dog and learn about animals because I want to be a veterinarian when I grow up. I own a corvette. I don't like to dress up because I am more comfortable in my own clothes. I'm not too concerned with my appearance. I have not weighed myself in a long time.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Creative, analytical, and sometimes anxious. Enjoys cooking and learning new skills.
participant_2.background: I would like to have a job where I can use my creativity and technical skills. I'm doing okay in school, though I'm a bit worried about my upcoming exams. I cooked a variety of Thai dishes for my family and friends while on vacation. I hate popcorn. I am afraid that my anxiety will prevent me from achieving my goals.

content.text: Hey hows it going? I'm in school studying to be a veterinarian.
Hi, I'm doing okay. I'm in school studying to be a software engineer.
Oh nice! What kind of software do you want to engineer?
I'm not sure yet, I'm still exploring my options.
Yeah it can be hard to decide what you want to do with your life.
Yeah, I'm just hoping to find something that I'm passionate about and that I'm good at.
That's a good goal. I'm passionate about animals and I'm good at learning about them and taking care of them.
That's great! I'm glad you've found something you're passionate about.
Thanks, I'm excited to start my career.
Me too! I'm hoping to have a job soon that I'm passionate about.
I'm sure you'll find something, you seem like a smart and capable person.
